Address.value: 3939 TECHNOLOGY DRIVE, MAUMEE, Ohio, 43537, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Dana Inc is engaged in the designing and manufacturing of efficient propulsion and energy-management solutions that power vehicles and machines in all mobility markets across the globe. The company is shaping sustainable progress through its conventional and clean-energy solutions that support nearly every vehicle manufacturer with drive and motion systems, electrodynamic technologies, including software and controls and thermal, sealing, and digital solutions. The company generates revenue from selling production parts to original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) and service parts to OEMs and aftermarket customers.

value.name: Andrea Siudara
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
